tags.name: L1 Org
tags.description:
Operations for Layer-1 organizations  
Check NFT Metadata Spec at: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y2TTQHOvqhNcPiyFB877_60Nj-PhwQwrNN3Y8CsSiSw/edit#gid=0  
Any operation requested under this L1 context, will be automatically applied with owned leafchain info

tags.description: Operations for inspecting THXNET. API Token

get.description: Get Transaction Status by Track ID
Get NFT by blockchain network and Token ID

post.description: Purchase the NFT in a NFT Sale
Create NFT Sale on a blockchain network
Cancel NFT Sale on a blockchain network
Claim the NFT in a NFT Claim

Initiate a Bifrost process.  
`receiver_id_wallet_address_eip191_signature_hash` can be generated via EIP191 signature process,  
please try MetaMask (with wallet `nft_original_holder_address`) and `Sign Message` at https://etherscan.io/verifiedSignatures# .  
Please put your own ID-Wallet Address (Ss58 format) into the `Message` field during EIP191 siging.

L1 generates end-users' THXNET. API Tokens, which are delegated by L1 Org

get.description: Get an ID-Wallet's NFTs on a blockchain network
Get an ID-Wallet's FTs on a blockchain network

TrackId.name: track_id
TrackId.description: A string value of the Track ID

TokenId.name: token_id
TokenId.description: A string value of the NFT's Token ID

IdWalletAddressSs58.name: id_wallet_address_ss58
IdWalletAddressSs58.description: A string value of ID Wallet Address (default Ss58 format)

BnId.name: bn_id
BnId.description: A enum string to specify which blockchain network to be used in the http request

BatchId.name: batch_id
BatchId.description: A string value of Batch ID

ApiResponse.description: Shape of THXNET. API JSON Response

status.description: The status of the result of the http request.

error.description:
Handled errors will start with following messages,  
and optionally there is the detail appended to the error message after ` ;; ` delimiter:

- `"not_found"`
- `"permission_denied"`
- `"unauthorized"`
- `"invalid_blockchain_network_id"`
- `"thxnet_api_token_expired"`
- `"invalid_thxnet_api_token"`
- `"invalid_access_token"`
- `"access_token_expired"`
- `"unsupported_blockchain_network"`
- `"invalid_value"`
- `"missing_value"`
- `"internal_error"`
- `"validation_failed"`
- `"too_fast"`
- `"nft_status_not_satisfied"`
- `"not_implemented"`
- `"service_unavailable"`

For example:
  - `"error": "permission_denied"`
  - `"error": "permission_denied ;; not the owner of nft"`
